overview: Pandu Dewanata returns to the country of Astina, with three princesses he won from a competition - the Goddess of Kunti, the Goddess of Madrin, and the Goddess of Gandari. Pandu is not so greedy to marry the three goddesses, so he offers one to be paired with his brother, Destarata, and another to his younger brother, Abiyasa
title: Pandawa Lima
